data.feedback: Plan fully covers all 9 user-requested epics with proper Clean Architecture structure. Files referenced in filesToModify/filesToRead were verified to exist. API contracts align perfectly with backend routes. Execution order is logical. Only minor issue is incorrect Android MainActivity path (com.example.app vs com.example.workspace).
issues: epic-platform-config references wrong MainActivity path: should be 'com/example/workspace' not 'com/example/app'
suggestions: Fix Android MainActivity path to com/example/workspace/MainActivity.kt
Explicitly list all new packages to add in pubspec.yaml modifications
Remove duplicate entries in epic dependencies arrays
